pages.title: Magnets
pages.text: $(l)Magnets$() are used to pull items towards the player when equipped. Around a $(l)Demagnetizer$() a magnet is disabled. A Magnet can also be disabled when in the $(l)curio slot Belt$().

A Magnet's Durability, Range, Velocity and Mana Efficiency can be $(l)upgraded$() in the $(l)Magnet Modification Table.$()$(br2)When the $(l)durability$() of a magnet runs out, it can be repaired with a $(l)Repair Core$() as long as it has repair slots remaining.
